objects.description: menuPass uses scripts to enumerate IP ranges on the victim network. (Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017) menuPass has also issued the command net view /domain to a PlugX implant to gather information about remote systems on the network. (Citation: FireEye APT10 April 2017)

external_references.description: PwC and BAE Systems. (2017, April). Operation Cloud Hopper: Technical Annex. Retrieved April 13, 2017.
external_references.source_name: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017

external_references.description: FireEye iSIGHT Intelligence. (2017, April 6). APT10 (MenuPass Group): New Tools, Global Campaign Latest Manifestation of Longstanding Threat. Retrieved June 29, 2017.
